job_tasks.phrase: build the most important features of a product
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the development of core product features, which is a fundamental aspect of software development.
Shaping technical direction involves making decisions about the software architecture and implementation, aligning with software development practices.
Ensuring stability and growth of a product through technical means falls under the umbrella of robust software development and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: drive the technical evolution of our products
job_tasks.justification: Driving technical evolution implies guiding the development and improvement of the software product's underlying technology.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring they are scalable, maintainable, and robust
job_tasks.justification: These are key quality attributes of well-engineered software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating closely with product teams, you will translate high-level requirements into technical design choices
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding business needs (high-level requirements) and translating them into technical solutions, demonstrating business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: solve complex challenges while maintaining high-quality standards
job_tasks.justification: Solving business-driven challenges with technical solutions and ensuring quality aligns with business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: Feature Development: Designing and implementing new features focusing on scalability, maintainability, and long-term product impact.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states the design and implementation of features, which are core software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Requirement Engineering: Collaborating with the product team to refine requirements and leading technical discussions to align features with product goals.
job_tasks.justification: Refining requirements and aligning features with product goals demonstrates understanding and integration of business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: Operations and Maintenance: Monitoring and maintaining product stability, tuning performance, and proactively identifying and resolving issues.
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring, maintaining stability, and resolving issues are key operational aspects of keeping software systems running smoothly.

job_tasks.phrase: Technical Design: Making stakes technical decisions directly impacting user experiences and product scalability.
job_tasks.justification: Making technical decisions that impact user experience and scalability are fundamental to software design and architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverages AI to bring historical figures to life
job_tasks.justification: Bringing historical figures to life using AI implies using generative models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category, specifically generative AI.

job_tasks.phrase: personalized, magical storytelling that boosts comprehension
job_tasks.justification: Creating personalized stories using AI suggests the application of generative models for content creation, fitting the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: integrates with existing apps, proactively coaching students
job_tasks.justification: Proactively coaching students using AI indicates the application of AI models for interactive assistance, fitting the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Uses AI-generated videos and tests to deliver measurable academic outcomes
job_tasks.justification: Using AI-generated videos and tests clearly involves generative AI models and their application to achieve specific outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: Our AI-first approach automates mundane tasks
job_tasks.justification: Automating tasks using an AI-first approach directly relates to the application of AI models for operational efficiency.

job_tasks.phrase: leverage generative AI to push boundaries
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions leveraging generative AI, placing the core activity within the 'Modeling' category.

soft_skills.phrase: focus on high-impact decisions and problem-solving
influencing how thousands of students learn and grow
You will have a high degree of autonomy

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions leveraging generative AI and showcases multiple products that utilize AI for content generation and student coaching. It emphasizes building applications around these AI capabilities, aligning perfectly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
